sourceDesc.p: Generated from the Open Office Document Books I've Read 2.0 (start Mar. 2008).odt.

listChange.change: Normalized whitespace, breaking lines at character 115. Fixed some typoes and errors that had cropped up.
Added XIncluded changelog entries for the generation of this file from the source ODT.
Added xml:lang for the entire document.

listEvent.head: Readings from March 2008 to the Present

event.p: Reread Special Topics in Being a Human.
